Package fr.xephi.authme.security.crypts

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EncryptionMethod
    Public interface for custom password encryption methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argon2  
    BCrypt
    BCrypt hash algorithm with configurable cost factor.
    BCrypt2y
    Hash for BCrypt in the $2y$ variant.
    BCryptBasedHash
    Abstract parent for BCrypt-based hash algorithms.
    BCryptHasher
    Wraps a BCrypt.Hasher instance and provides methods suitable for use in AuthMe.
    CmwCrypt
    Hash algorithm to hook into the CMS Craft My Website.
    CrazyCrypt1  
    DoubleMd5 Deprecated
    HashedPassword
    The result of a hash computation.
    HexSaltedMethod
    Common type for encryption methods which use a random String of hexadecimal characters and store the salt with the hash itself.
    Ipb3  
    Ipb4
    Implementation for Ipb4 (Invision Power Board 4).
    Joomla  
    Md5 Deprecated
    Md5vB  
    MyBB  
    Pbkdf2  
    Pbkdf2Django  
    PhpBB
    Encryption method compatible with phpBB3.
    PhpFusion  
    RoyalAuth  
    Salted2Md5  
    SaltedSha512  
    SeparateSaltMethod
    Common supertype for encryption methods which store their salt separately from the hash.
    Sha1 Deprecated
    Sha256  
    Sha512 Deprecated
    Smf
    Hashing algorithm for SMF forums.
    TwoFactor
    Two factor authentication.
    UnsaltedMethod
    Common type for encryption methods which do not use any salt whatsoever.
    UsernameSaltMethod
    Common supertype of encryption methods that use a player's username (or something based on it) as embedded salt.
    Wbb3  
    Wbb4  
    Whirlpool Deprecated
    Wordpress  
    XAuth  
    XfBCrypt
